statements.select:
SELECT [u_id],[u_name],[salt],[u_nicker],[u_skin],[sup_name],[u_type],[su_type],[add_date],[last_changedate],[six_rate],[six_credit],[six_usable_credit],[six_kind],[a_state],[allow_sale],[allow_view_report],[six_allow_maxrate],[six_low_maxrate],[six_rate_owner],[six_iscash],[allow_opt],[is_changed],[kc_rate],[kc_credit],[kc_usable_credit],[kc_kind],[kc_allow_sale],[negative_sale],[kc_allow_maxrate],[kc_low_maxrate],[kc_rate_owner],[kc_crash_payment],[kc_iscash],[six_op_odds],[kc_op_odds],[kc_isauto_back],[six_isauto_back],[retry_times],[u_psw] FROM [dbo].[cz_users] WHERE 1 = 1 AND ($where$)
order by $OrderBy$

SELECT
Top (#Top#)
[u_id],[u_name],[salt],[u_nicker],[u_skin],[sup_name],[u_type],[su_type],[add_date],[last_changedate],[six_rate],[six_credit],[six_usable_credit],[six_kind],[a_state],[allow_sale],[allow_view_report],[six_allow_maxrate],[six_low_maxrate],[six_rate_owner],[six_iscash],[allow_opt],[is_changed],[kc_rate],[kc_credit],[kc_usable_credit],[kc_kind],[kc_allow_sale],[negative_sale],[kc_allow_maxrate],[kc_low_maxrate],[kc_rate_owner],[kc_crash_payment],[kc_iscash],[six_op_odds],[kc_op_odds],[kc_isauto_back],[six_isauto_back],[retry_times],[u_psw] FROM [dbo].[cz_users] WHERE 1 = 1 AND ($where$)
order by $OrderBy$
